blogPost.excerpt: 🏴 Flagpack is an open source project of 260+ stunning flag icons for your digital product. Easily implementable in your design or code project. Download for Figma, Sketch and Adobe XD (coming soon) or install for React, Vue or Angular (coming soon).
blogPost.body: 🏴 Flagpack is an open source project of 260+ stunning flag icons for your digital product. Easily implementable in your design or code project. Download for Figma, Sketch and Adobe XD (coming soon) or install for React, Vue or Angular (coming soon).
blogPost.title: Flagpack - Stunning open source flag icons for your digital product
blogPost.author: Leon Ephraïm

localize.description: 旗帜包是一个开源项目，它为您的数字产品提供了260多个令人惊叹的旗帜图标。可以在您的设计或代码项目中轻松实现。下载Figma、Sketch和Adobe XD（即将推出）或安装React、Vue或Angular（即将推出）。
localize.tagline: 为您的数字产品提供令人惊叹的开源旗帜图标。

localize.description: 旗幟包是一個開源項目，它爲您的數字產品提供了260多個令人驚歎的旗幟圖標。可以在您的設計或代碼項目中輕鬆實現。下載Figma、Sketch和Adobe XD（即將推出）或安裝React、Vue或Angular（即將推出）。
localize.tagline: 爲您的數字產品提供令人驚歎的開源旗幟圖標。

previous.excerpt: Already trusted by companies like Cartier, Square, Conde Nast, and Signal Messaging, Mixer is a professional network empowering creatives to make the right connections, find jobs, and recruit top talent.
previous.title: Mixer - The Creative Network - Make connections, find jobs, and recruit top creative talent

localize.description: Mixer已经受到卡地亚、Square、Conde Nast和Signal Messaging等公司的信任，它是一个专业的网络，帮助创意人建立正确的联系，找到工作，并招募顶尖人才。
localize.tagline: 建立联系，寻找工作，招聘顶级创意人才。

localize.description: Mixer已經受到卡地亞、Square、Conde Nast和Signal Messaging等公司的信任，它是一個專業的網絡，幫助創意人建立正確的聯繫，找到工作，並招募頂尖人才。
localize.tagline: 建立聯繫，尋找工作，招聘頂級創意人才。
